#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int gcd(int a, int b)
{
    while(b)
    {
        int temp=a;
        a=b;
        b=temp%a;
    }
    return a;
}

int main()
{
    int test;
    scanf("%d", &test);
    while(test--)
    {
        int n, m;
        scanf("%d %d", &n, &m);
        printf("%d\n", m-gcd(n, m));
    }
}
